statements: UPDATE ThirdPartyIntegration SET app_name='App1', api_key='abc123', data_exchange_mode='pull' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ThirdPartyIntegration SET data_exchange_mode='push', app_name='App2' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE ThirdPartyIntegration SET data_exchange_mode = 'push', last_updated = NOW() WHERE id = 1
UPDATE ThirdPartyIntegration SET app_name = 'NewApp', api_key = 'newApiKey', last_updated = '2023-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE third_party_apps SET app_name='App 1', app_description='Description for App 1' WHERE app_id=1;
UPDATE app_data SET data_value='Value 2', data_timestamp='2022-10-20 15:30:00' WHERE data_id=2;
UPDATE third_party_apps SET app_description='Updated description' WHERE app_id=1;
UPDATE app_data SET data_value='New value' WHERE data_id=2;
UPDATE third_party_applications SET app_name = 'New App Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_exchanges SET exchange_type = 'New Exchange Type', exchange_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE exchange_id = 3;
UPDATE third_party_applications SET app_name='NewName', app_type='NewType' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE data_exchanges SET exchange_type='NewType', exchange_date='2022-01-01' WHERE exchange_id=2;
UPDATE third_party_applications SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE data_exchange_logs SET status = 'Completed', detail = 'Data exchange completed successfully' WHERE log_id = 10;
UPDATE third_party_applications SET description='New Description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_credentials SET username='new_username', email='new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE third_party_applications SET app_version='2.0' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_access SET access_level='admin' WHERE user_id='987e6543-e21b-43d1-b876-321456789000';
UPDATE third_party_applications SET integration_status = true, app_description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE data_mappings SET mapping_details = '{"field1":"value1","field2":"value2"}', last_updated = '2023-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE mapping_name = 'Mapping ABC';
